item.description:
A dark cloud is looming over the Grand Republic. Evil forces have gathered a massive army to strike at the heart of the Republic. Brave knights have taken up arms to protect all that they hold dear from the dark army. Will you choose to side with the invading forces and bring chaos to the galaxy, or will you choose to keep order and safeguard peace? A solid defense or a powerful offense, which will win at the end of the day? Anyone from 6 to adult is welcome at this high-energy two hour long sword fighting event!

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember.
item.name: Buddy Night: Galactic War
